name: Crock O'Gold Slots 2 - Dublin Yer Cash TV
name_original: Crock O'Gold Slots 2 - Dublin Yer Cash TV
description:
***** NO ADS ***** NO IAP'S ***** JUST UNLIMITED FREE COINS PLUS VALUE AND FUN! *****

Crock O'Gold Slots 2 - Dublin Yer Cash is the new improved best Irish themed lucky vegas casino slot machine / pokie from Mobile Amusements where you can win a massive virtual cash fortune!

With unlimited FREE coins and bonuses, try to win as many riches as possible by also playing features such as the Leprechaun's Rainbow Wheel of Fortune bonus feature plus the Triple 7 and Lucky Money mini-games to accumulate virtual credit prize bonuses.

As you progress you will journey around 40 levels in the Capital City of Dublin on the beautiful Emerald Isle of Ireland to gain even more fantastic prize bonuses and new features.

Including extra features such as FREE Magic Fairy Spell Spins, $10,000 Bonus Shamrock Clover, 2x Dublin Yer Cash charmed reel payout feature, Lucky Line, Super Lines, Multi-Free Spins and HUGE Cash Bonuses.

Will you celebrate a St. Paddy's Day again and aquire a large portion of Leprechauns glittering gold riches and perhaps open the 6th reel for a chance to win the BIG Progressive Lucky Rainbow Jackpot itself?

Happy St. Patricks Day - May the luck of the Irish be with you once more!

Features:

* Improved gameplay and features.
* Up to 6 Reels to play (when 6th reel opens).
* 25 Payout Lines.
* Rainbow Wheel of Fortune bonus feature.
* Triple 7 mini-game.
* Lucky Money mini-game.
* FREE Magic Fairy Spell Spins.
* $10K Bonus Shamrock Clover.
* Around Dublin progressive feature map with 40 levels!
* 2x Dublin Yer Cash charmed reel payout feature.
* Lucky Leprechaun reel (reveals 6th reel).
* Two Super Pay Lines that each pay out 2x winnings.
* Lucky Line feature that pays out 5x winnings.
* Mega 5 and 6 reel Jackpots!
* Wild Symbols.
* Cumulative Free Spins Feature.
* Mini Cash Bonuses.
* Variable bet per. line.
* HUGE Max bets progressing up to $10,000 each as you travel around Dublin.
* Auto-Spin button.
* Help and Paytable screens.
* Continue/Resume game option.
* Best Hi-Credit and persistent credits and machine status.
* Superb quality themed graphics and realistic sound fx.
